title: Museum of Simulation Technology (MoST) MAC
description:
School: Carnegie Mellon University, Entertainment Technology Center

Creator: Albert Shih

Description: When taking a photo, have you ever used perspective to pretend a large object in the distance is resting in the palm of your hand? Then you have experienced "forced perspective."

This is a puzzle game inspired by forced perspective. In this game, you use the ambiguity of perspective to resize and move objects at your will while you traverse the landscape of a mysterious museum.
